verses.text: Blessed \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* one who cares \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* poor; \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will deliver \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* trouble.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w protect|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserve|strong="H4422"\w* \w him|strong="H4422"\w*; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bless \w him|strong="H4422"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H3068"\w* surrender \w him|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* foes.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sustain \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w of|strong="H3068"\w* illness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* restore \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sickness.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H3068"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w heal|strong="H2015"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* enemies say \w with|strong="H3068"\w* malice: “\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* die \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* forgotten?”

\w My|strong="H4191"\w* visitor speaks falsehood; \w he|strong="H8034"\w* gathers slander \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* heart; \w he|strong="H8034"\w* goes \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H4191"\w* spreads \w it|strong="H8034"\w* abroad.

\w All|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H7723"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7200"\w* whisper \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*; \w they|strong="H2351"\w* imagine \w the|strong="H7200"\w* worst \w for|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*:

“\w A|strong="H3068"\w* vile disease \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* poured \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* never get \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* lies!”

\w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* close friend whom \w I|strong="H1697"\w* trusted, \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* shared \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bread, \w has|strong="H1697"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* heel \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*.\f + \fr 41:9 \ft Cited in John 13:18\f*

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H1571"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* raise \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w that|strong="H3899"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* repay \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6965"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy \w does|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* triumph \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* integrity \w You|strong="H3588"\w* uphold \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* set \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* forever.

Blessed \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*. Amen \w and|strong="H5769"\w* Amen.
